personalInfo.name: Gonzalo Ronz√≥n
personalInfo.title: Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer

summary: Enthusiastic and adaptable Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer with 5 years of experience in software engineering and project management, specializing in front-end development with React and back-end integration using Django.

Proficient in agile methodologies, network updates, and software development lifecycles, with expertise in designing efficient platforms, automating workflows, and enhancing team performance through innovative solutions like Copilot agents and real-time SRT stream monitoring.

Highly committed and responsible, I foster positive and collaborative environments with exceptional teamwork skills, consistently taking the initiative and pursuing continuous professional and personal growth.

Leveraging my skills as a Full Stack Engineer, I aspire to design, implement, and maintain cutting-edge web applications that help organizations achieve their goals. I thrive in dynamic environments where innovation and teamwork are key.

details: Design and implement network infrastructure updates, researching technological solutions and best practices for broadcast operations.
Develop AI-powered automation agents using Copilot Studio to streamline workflows, generate executive summaries, and improve operational efficiency across departments.
Create and maintain enterprise Power Apps for ticketing, notifications, and KPI tracking, reducing manual processes by up to 60%.
Build and deploy microservices monitoring platforms using Python, FastAPI, Docker, and PostgreSQL, serving as a teaching template to upskill production engineers in software development capabilities.
Lead technical mentoring initiatives, creating beginner-friendly documentation and hands-on training to transition production engineers from non-coding backgrounds to developing automation solutions.
Develop broadcast automation platforms with Node.js, TypeScript, and WebRTC for device control and media streaming integration.
Implement audio patching automation servers with Python and web interface automation, achieving consistent 1.7-second operation times.

Function as technical producer for live sports coverage, coordinating with Premier League production teams and managing communication with commentators and talent in audio booths for soccer match narrations.
Deploy and standardize broadcast infrastructure for live sports coverage, improving setup efficiency by 40% through documentation and kit standardization.
Manage CI/CD workflows, technical budgets, and vendor coordination while maintaining comprehensive technical documentation and user manuals.
Provide expert technical support for broadcast tools and systems, resolving real-time operational issues and enhancing team collaboration.
Configure audiovisual workflows, monitor signals, and maintain equipment in server rooms and studios for optimal broadcast performance.
Led seamless React application integrations with extensive unit and integration testing.
Resolved software issues and developed intuitive user interfaces (UI) using Adobe XD.
Adopted agile practices and DevOps for Django-based backends, promoting effective cross-team collaboration.
Created detailed and precise rack plans with Visio, translating documents from English to Spanish.
Maintained broadcast equipment for optimal performance and supported broadcast productions.
Advanced a data management app and built a Power BI dashboard to monitor team performance.
Maintained a webpage using Angular for optimal performance and user experience.
Produced multimedia products via Adobe Creative Suite for educational projects.
Showcased leadership in digital design for online courses and project management.

education.degree: Specialization in Engineering and Project Management
education.details: Focused on advanced methodologies for software engineering and team collaboration.

education.degree: Bachelor in Information Technologies and Intelligent Systems
education.details: Concentrated on systems design, network architectures, and intelligent solutions.

about.description: I'm a passionate Information Technology and Intelligent Systems Engineer based in CDMX, Mexico. Beyond the code and technical specifications, I'm an innovative thinker who thrives on solving complex problems and creating efficient solutions.
about.approach: I believe in the power of continuous learning and staying ahead of technological trends. My adaptable nature and strong communication skills allow me to work effectively in diverse teams and bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.
about.interests: When I'm not coding or exploring new technologies, I enjoy staying active through sports, especially football or bowling. I'm passionate about cinema, videogames, pop culture, dancing, solving puzzles, and reading. These hobbies allow me to stay creative, engaged, and balanced in both my personal and professional life.

traits.title: Innovative Thinker
traits.description: Always seeking creative solutions to complex challenges

traits.description: Quick to learn and embrace new technologies and methodologies
